lead_paragraph: It was third time lucky for American Serena Williams as she finally matched Steffi Graf's professional era record of 22 grand slam singles titles by beating Angelique Kerber to claim a seventh Wimbledon crown on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Number 22 and Still Counting as Serena Equals Graf
headline.main: Number 22 and Still Counting as Serena Equals Graf
